body:
I could add them in `common.py` or create a new file `common_linalg.py` which will contain all linear algebra based factory functions in it. `random_fullrank_matrix_distinct_singular_values` is one among a bunch of similar-looking functions. Which one would you prefer?

Also, `_test_matrix_power` has the same import as well.
body_html:
I could add them in common.py or create a new file common_linalg.py which will contain all linear algebra based factory functions in it. random_fullrank_matrix_distinct_singular_values is one among a bunch of similar-looking functions. Which one would you prefer?

Also, _test_matrix_power has the same import as well.
